     throws NullParameterException,
            InvalidParameterException

        name - The name attribute of the Body to be created.

        InvalidParameterException - Thrown if the name is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • addAxis

        public boolean addAxis(Axis theAxis)
        Adds the axis to the body.
        Parameters:
        theAxis - The axis to add to this body.
        Returns:
        True if successfully added. False if the axis specified already existed in the body.

      • containsAxis

        public boolean containsAxis(Axis theAxis)
        Checks if the body contains the specified axis.
        Parameters:
        theAxis - The axis to check.
        Returns:
        True if the axis is on the body, false otherwise.

        public PositionMatrix mapToBody(PositionMatrix tm)
        Method for mapping a transformation matrix to a body instead of the global origin.
        Parameters:
        tm - The transformation matrix to be re-mapped.
        Returns:
        The re-mapped transformation matrix.

      • removeAxis

        public boolean removeAxis(Axis theAxis)
        Removes the axis from the body.
        Parameters:
        theAxis - The axis to remove from the body.
        Returns:
        True if successfully removed. False if the axis specified wasn't part of the body.

                           boolean notify)
        Method for setting the position matrix and notifying the observers.
        Parameters:
        shapeMatrix - The position matrix to set.
        notify - Set to true to notify any subscribed observers.
